data: When word came from the inner world that David Innes, Emperor of Pellucidar, was imprisoned in a Korsar dungeon, Jason Gridley sped to the jungles of Africa to seek aid from the one man capable of besting the terrors of savage Pellucidar.
browsing: literature|browsing: science-fiction & fantasy|browsing: fiction|category: science-fiction & fantasy|category: adventure|category: novels
